august: Fixed `-hangman`'s ephemeral message not showing up when clicking another user's button
Fixed `-profile`'s ephemeral message not showing up when using another user's select menu
Made it possible to use clan IDs at `-clan`
july: Fixed background name sometimes not displayed if selecting the format at `-backgrounds`
Fixed `-clan`'s first clan result not showing clans default color
may: Hidden parts of the player's profile are now flagged as hidden by the bot
april: Fixed `-challenges` next page button sometimes not working, causing the interaction to fail
